document_data.name: Blaedron
document_data.mainbody: '''Blaedron''' was a person known to a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].Blaedron almost certainly must have been a War Wizard or sanctum staffer.
document_data.History: One of the War Wizards protecting [[Vangerdahast]] in his sanctum near [[Mouth o' Gargoyles]] after his retirement as [[Royal Mage]] called out to someone thinking they were Blaedron during [[Harnrim Starangh]]'s raid into the sanctum. Harnrim took that moment's hesitation to slay them.
